recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook spaghetti until al dente. Reserve some pasta water.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan together. Set aside.
Sauté pancetta in olive oil, add garlic.
Toss drained pasta with pancetta, remove from heat.
Stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water if needed.
Season with salt and pepper, serve immediately.

recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo
instructions: Season and cook chicken, slice and set aside.
Cook fettuccine pasta until al dente.
Melt butter, sauté garlic, add heavy cream.
Stir in Parmesan, mix until smooth.
Combine pasta with sauce, top with chicken.
Serve hot with extra Parmesan.

recipes.name: Tacos al Pastor
ingredients: ½ cup chopped onions and cilantro for garnish
instructions: Marinate pork with spices and lime juice.
Cook pork slices until slightly charred.
Grill pineapple alongside pork.
Warm tortillas, assemble tacos with pork and pineapple.
Top with onions and cilantro, serve with lime.

recipes.name: Butter Chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken with spices for 30 minutes.
Cook chicken in butter until browned.
Add garlic, tomato purée, and simmer.
Pour in heavy cream, stir well.
Simmer for 10 minutes, serve with rice or naan.

recipes.name: Sushi Rolls
instructions: Cook rice, season with vinegar and sugar.
Spread rice on nori, add fish, cucumber, avocado.
Roll tightly, slice into pieces.
Serve with soy sauce.

recipes.name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Whisk in milk, egg, and melted butter.
Cook pancakes on a heated pan until golden.
Serve with syrup or fruit.

recipes.name: Greek Salad
instructions: Combine cucumber, tomatoes, onion, feta, and olives.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Toss gently, serve fresh.

recipes.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter one side of each bread slice.
Place cheese between bread, buttered sides out.
Grill on medium heat until golden brown.
Serve warm.

recipes.name: Tomato Soup
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil.
Add tomatoes, cook until soft.
Pour in broth, simmer for 10 minutes.
Blend until smooth, season, serve warm.
